Class Composition

java.lang.Object
  com.code.aon.composition.Composition
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class Composition
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.code.aon.common.ITransferObject, com.code.aon.common.ILookupObject

Transfer Object that represents a product composition.
